• removing date-fns package saves 100kb

elements.text:
EOD 24/10/2023

How did the day go?

attachments.text:
*Describe the bug*  
Pressure Sore popup does not close when clicked outside

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to a patient's consultation dashboard
2. Open the "Pressure Sore" tab
3. Open a popup and attempt to click outside

*Expected behavior*  
The popup should close onBlur/click outside.

Consider using headlessui's Popover component instead which would out of the box handle onBlur/click outside (and for consistent behaviour across other popover usages)

*Screenshots*  
<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25143503/274844585-ab2a7e65-e40f-4a46-8a14-6a5bbd7b1993.png|image>
attachments.title: #6446 Pressure Sore popup does not close when clicked outside

attachments.fallback: #6901 Added Timeline UI for Bed Activity
attachments.text:
*Proposed Changes*

• Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/6771|#6771>
• Integrated Timeline for Bed Activity using *BedActivityTimeline*

What's Changed?  
<https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/63492939/312103627-1054684c-409c-4927-8dab-1f056f6a3cda.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..EhWy1GyaDBqVTLDevyKDHIT4GhM9pfeprvpLrsBDnhM|image>  
Before:  
<https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/63492939/292778831-4f94667b-d42f-4ae7-a596-b760de3e76c7.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1LJC84zOO-pUnRZnPxVzwotzJkIekUIHL8RNNO6qQ2w|Bed Timeline Before>

@ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers @ohcnetwork/code-reviewers

*Merge Checklist*

☐ Add specs that demonstrate bug / test a new feature.
☐ Update <https://docs.coronasafe.network/coronasafe-care-documentation/architecture/architecture-and-layering-of-care|product documentation>.
☐ Ensure that UI text is kept in I18n files.
☐ Prep screenshot or demo video for changelog entry, and attach it to issue.
☐ Request for Peer Reviews
☐ Completion of QA
